ORDER

Dismissed as not pressed.

However, the petitioners shall be at
liberty to raise all their contentions
before the court below at the appropriate
stage.

The petitioners shall be granted
exemption from personal appearance before
the court below on all posting dates except
when their presence is necessary for the
progress of the case, if the petitioners
surrender before the court below within 30
days from today and file application in this
regard.

Sd/-
B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR,
